ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​Factory
ssGUI::​Factory

Extensions & EventCallbacks must be created and disposed via this class.  You can also create GUI Objects via this class but it is not required.

Functions
Create
template< template<typename T> class Wrapper, typename T> static Wrapper<T>* Create()

Creates the object on the heap

Create
template<typename T> static T* Create()

Creates the object on the heap

Dispose
template<typename T> static void Dispose(
T* obj
)

Delete the object allocated on the heap
